channel.title: Topics on PHI 152
channel.description: Recent content in Topics on PHI 152

item.title: Topic 1: Logic
item.description: What is logic? What is deductive logic? Could deductive logic be the logic of science? Is non-deductive logic possible? Reading (This is what you should read for this section. The due dates appear on the schedule.) 1. Ian Hacking, An Introduction to Probability and Inductive Logic (purchased book) Chapter 1 “Logic”, whole chapter, pages 1–7. See also (Note that items in this section are posted for your possible interest. They are not required.
